name: Beats Solo3 Wireless on-Ear Headphones
description: The Beats Solo3 Wireless on-Ear Headphones are a premium set of headphones that feature Bluetooth connectivity, up to 40 hours of battery life, and on-ear controls for adjusting volume and switching tracks. they have a sleek stylish design and come in a variety of colors. they also have a build-in microphone for taking calls and use the Apple W1 chip for easy and stable connectivity with Apple services

name: Smartphone Galaxy S21
description: The Galaxy S21 is a high-end smartphone with a stunning display, powerful camera system, and fast performance. It features a 6.2-inch Dynamic AMOLED display, a triple-lens rear camera with 64MP main sensor, 8GB RAM, and 128GB internal storage. Stay connected in style with the sleek and modern Galaxy S21.

name: Laptop Inspiron 15
description: The Dell Inspiron 15 is a powerful and versatile laptop suitable for work and entertainment. It features a 15.6-inch Full HD display, Intel Core i7 processor, 16GB RAM, and 512GB SSD storage. With a sleek design and long-lasting battery, the Inspiron 15 is a reliable companion for your computing needs.

name: Wireless Bluetooth Earbuds Yamaha
description: Experience true wireless freedom with these Bluetooth earbuds. They offer crystal-clear sound, a comfortable fit, and easy pairing with your devices. With a sleek charging case, you can enjoy music on the go without worrying about battery life.

name: Shure SM7B Cardioid Dynamic Microphone
description: The Shure SM7B is a cardioid dynamic microphone that is designed for use in a variety of settings, including live performances, podcasting, and home recording. It features a smooth, flat, wide-range frequency response and a built-in pop filter and shock mount for reduced noise and handling noise.

name: AmazonBasics Desktop Mini Condenser Microphone
description: The AmazonBasics Desktop Mini Condenser Microphone is a compact and affordable option for recording vocals, instruments, and more. It features a cardioid polar pattern for improved sound isolation and a built-in stand for easy placement. Compatible with most devices with a 3.5mm jack.

name: KOORUI Business Computer Monitor Display
description: The KOORUI Business Computer Monitor Display is a 27-inch LED monitor that features a 1080P resolution and a wide viewing angle. It has a sleek and slim design with a thickness of only 7mm and a frameless design. The monitor supports VESA mount and it is compatible with most computer systems.
